name: A Tied Tale
description:
A Tied Tale:

Help navigate feuding brothers Oswald and Arlo through a well that is not what it seems. Utilize the rope that connects them to solve a series of puzzles in this whimsical underground world. Maybe by the end of it, the siblings will find that they are more connected than before.

NOTE: The yellow boxes need both brothers to activate! The blue ones only need one brother.

Credits:

  • Chris Liu: Programming, Design
  • Kira Sincock: Art, Producer
  • Dennis Wang: Writing, Design
  • Nichole Wong: Art, UI Programming
  • Elias Yang: Background Art

Additional Credits:

  • Kiwi Maru font by Hiroki-Chan
  • Mysterious Horn Theme by Steve O' Brien
  • Various sound effects from Zapsplat
